description:
Meeting the person you`re destined for is a miracle... But that`s never restrained to gender...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mon otaku de petit frère a peu d’amis. Ça m’attriste
My Otaku Brother Can`t Have So Few Friends (etc.)
Otaku no Ore no Otouto ga Konna ni Tomodachi ga Sukunai Wake ga (ry
オタクの俺の弟がこんなに友達が少ない訳が(ry
